name: Blue Bomber (Nithman)
description:
A game made in one week for the 4th Brackeys Game Jam

Stay alive as long as possible and defeat enemy bombers to rewind your life countdown timer! 

Also don't forget to set your mouse sensitivity each time you play.

Controls : WASD / Arrow Keys, Mouse, Left click to shoot, Right click to detonate your bombs

Game Engine: Unity

Art: Blender

Music: MuseNet AI

Thanks for playing!
